metadata.Description: The incorporation of indigenous and traditional knowledge systems into sustainable energy planning and decision-making processes.

entities.Description: Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge implements building standards that incorporate indigenous practices and wisdom.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge funds research projects that explore the integration of indigenous knowledge into sustainable energy practices.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge focuses on renewable energy technologies that align with indigenous values and principles.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge is integrated in policy development processes to ensure the inclusion of indigenous perspectives and practices.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge partners with indigenous communities to co-create sustainable energy solutions that respect and incorporate traditional practices.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge contributes to community empowerment by valuing and utilizing indigenous knowledge in sustainable energy initiatives.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge monitors knowledge exchange programs that facilitate the sharing of indigenous energy practices and experiences.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge

relations.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge targets capacity building initiatives to enhance the understanding and application of indigenous energy knowledge.
relations.Subject: integrating traditional knowledge
renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies provide support and resources for community-based renewable energy projects to empower local communities and promote sustainable development.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies administer feed-in tariff programs to incentivize the production of renewable energy and promote its integration into the grid.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies measure and track the growth of renewable energy capacity to assess the progress towards a sustainable and clean energy future.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies align their activities and initiatives with the Sustainable Development Goals to contribute to the global agenda for sustainable development.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies are government agencies dedicated to promoting and supporting the development of renewable energy sources.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.
